name: Custom Stock Ledger Report
query:
SELECT 
    sle.item_code AS "Item Code:Link/Item:150",
    item.item_group AS "Item Group:Link/Item Group:150",
    sle.warehouse AS "Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:150",
    AVG(sle.valuation_rate) AS "Average Valuation Rate:Currency:100",
    SUM(sle.stock_value) AS "Total Stock Value:Currency:120",
    
    IFNULL((
        SELECT SUM(sn.custom_weight) 
        FROM `tabSerial No` sn
        WHERE sn.item_code = sle.item_code
        AND sn.status = 'Active'
    ), 0) AS "Total Weight:Float:120",
    
    IFNULL((
        SELECT SUM(sn.custom_length)  -- Corrected field for meters
        FROM `tabSerial No` sn
        WHERE sn.item_code = sle.item_code
        AND sn.status = 'Active'
    ), 0) AS "Total Meters:Float:120"
FROM `tabStock Ledger Entry` sle
JOIN `tabItem` item ON sle.item_code = item.item_code
LEFT JOIN `tabBin` bin ON sle.item_code = bin.item_code AND sle.warehouse = bin.warehouse
LEFT JOIN `tabBOM` bom ON bom.item = sle.item_code  -- Join to include sub-assemblies
WHERE (item.item_group = 'Products' OR bom.item IS NOT NULL)  -- Include both products and sub-assemblies
AND sle.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
GROUP BY sle.item_code, sle.warehouse
ORDER BY sle.item_code, sle.warehouse;
